marketplaces.name: botfiles
marketplaces.description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins for Zig, Elixir/Phoenix, infrastructure operations, and developer workflow tools.

plugins.name: zig-dev
plugins.description: Zig development skills: style enforcement, memory leak detection, safety checking, error handling, and API reference.

plugins.name: elixir-phoenix
plugins.description: Elixir and Phoenix development skills: framework guidelines, LiveView patterns, Ecto best practices, HEEx templates, testing, and Tailwind CSS v4.

plugins.name: infra-ops
plugins.description: Infrastructure operations skills: Terraform safety, Docker Swarm patterns, Ansible operations, and repeatable deployment philosophy.

plugins.name: workflow-tools
plugins.description: Developer workflow skills: commit message conventions, Beads issue tracking, and session completion protocols.
